New Records: Mohamed Salah and Mohamed Elneny both reached 100 caps for Egypt in the match
Key Match Events: Trezeguet scored two goals in the 4th and 29th minutes
Mostafa Fathi scored in the 90th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Hossam Hassan had to change his lineup heavily due to injuries and absences
Egypt had won their opening game 3-0 against Cape Verde
Post-Match Reflections: Egypt now tops the group with six points from two games
They have scored seven goals and did not concede any in the first two games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Osama Faisal made his debut for Egypt
Khaled Sobhi made his debut for Egypt
Ibrahim Adel, Ahmed Nabil Kouka, and Mohamed Elneny came on as substitutes for Salah, Trezeguet, and Hamdi Fathi
